page.title: 10THE MILK INDUSTRY
page.content: The changes in the{milk industry} arose when the "fitness phase" began. More skimmed milk is being sold and more people are looking for perfect slim and slender bodies. { Green Top}milk contains fat and bacteria therefore many people have changed to skimmed milk.{Skimmed}milk, however, contains no fat or bacteria. { Hildale Dairies}produces 70,000 pints of milk each day. The best selling milk in the dairy is{pasturised.}Green Top milk is vanishing rapidly. Hildale Dairy was started by 14 farmers who wanted a place to pasturise their milk in one place. The dairy has grown rapidly, and now sells its own products to most of West Yorkshire.
